archimate:Grouping.name: SOGP Accidental Threat Events
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
This grouping shows threat events from the Threat Event Catalogue in the Standard Of Good Practice.
It presents the threat events that could be initiated by the threats within the accidental threat group (e.g. customer, employee (privileged) and vendor). This group includes threats that, as a result of error or unintentional actions (or inaction), cause harm to an organisationâ€™s information or systems.
